item.title: MySQL Unable to lock ibdata1 error 11 fix
item.description: A bad shutdown can cause such erros on MySQL. InnoDB: Unable to lock ./ibdata1, error: 11 InnoDB: Check that you do not already have another mysqld process InnoDB: using the same InnoDB data or log files. InnoDB: Error in opening ./ibdata1 For solution mv ibdata1 ibdata1.bak cp -a ibdata1.bak ibdata1 service mysqld restart
